Frank Townsend

  1. Foster Name:
  2. Foster Family: Arnold and Ida Miserez
  3. Location of Family: West Point, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: West Point, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 13
  7. Date of Birth: 1897-04-05, NY
  8. Date of Death: 7/19/1983, Crawford, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Source: Cuming Democrat, 29 October 1909; West Point Republican, 29 October 1909; 1910 United States Federal Census; 1940 United States Federal Census; Find-A-Grave for Frank J. Townsend.
